# Yaygara

> Fun party game based on narration and guessing.

## Description
Yaygara is an interactive, in-person party game where players describe words through narration, single-word clues, or charades. It supports multiple languages (English and Turkish) and allows for AI-generated custom decks.

## Key Features
- Multi-language support (EN, TR)
- Single-device hand-to-hand gameplay
- AI Deck Constructor
- PWA support for offline play

## Tech Stack
- React, Vite, TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion
- Zustand for state management
- Cloudflare Workers/Wrangler for deployment

## URLs
- Homepage: https://yaygara.mertskaplan.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/mertskaplan/yaygara
